## Connection.post() method

Perform HTTP POST

**Signature:**

```typescript
post(url?: string | URL, payload?: string | any, raw?: boolean): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string \| URL | _(Optional)_ The URL for the POST request. Optional. |
|  payload | string \| any | _(Optional)_ The payload for the POST request. Optional. |
|  raw | boolean | _(Optional)_ Indicates whether to return the raw response. Optional. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;

A promise that resolves to the response of the POST request.
